name: A Pretty Bevaverage Game
description:
There are some dranks. Ya might wanna drink said dranks. Also, the cat boi might have some fun stuff to say (+ if ya get stuck, talk to 'im and 'ell help ya out).

All the bevaverage names are shuffled from a list, play it a few times to get all the combos, if ya want.

This was made in under 2 hrs for a school class game "jam". It's really short, and barely a game, but I hope ya enjoy!
